sections.title: What is Space?
sections.content: Space is the vast, seemingly infinite expanse that exists beyond the Earth and between celestial bodies.

sections.title: Why Study Space?
sections.content: Studying space helps us understand our universe, origins, and the laws of physics.

sections.title: Kepler's Laws
sections.content: Kepler's laws describe planetary motion. The first law states that planets move in ellipses with the Sun at one focus.

sections.title: Gravity in Orbits
sections.content: Gravity is the force that keeps planets in orbit around the Sun.
